text: @NYGovCuomo OPEN NYC NOW! And stop the hypocrisy. There was a 10k+ people protest for #BLACKTRANSLIVESMATTER on Sunday in Brooklyn. You didn’t do anything about it so don’t pretend Covid19 is the problem. #OpenNYC
